==Translingual==
{{Han simplified forms|縣|県|县}}

===Etymology===
{{liushu|p}} – a head “[[首]]“ (of a decapitated criminal) hung upside down, with the hair hanging down. The original form of [[懸]]. Compare [[辟]].

Also Japanese shinjitai {{Han simp|縣|f=系|t=&nbsp;}}.

===Han character===
{{Han char|rn=109|rad=目|as=04|sn=9|four=|canj=BUVF|ids=⿱⿺𠃊目小}}

# The original form of [[懸]]
# The simplification of [[縣]] in Japanese

====Usage notes====
Exists as a traditional Chinese character, but not generally used in Chinese in isolation. In Japanese, used as simplification of [[縣]].
